TopicTitle: 2011 member coming back, and thank you Squad for the many years!

Articles.Content: Hey guys, I got a request for the moderators real quick, my account I used to use was brody\_peffley, I made that account because of the forum crash in 2013 which I thought destroyed this one.. I wish that you will delete that one since I've been trying to find this account for ever. Though here I am! 2011 member, I remember the good old days back in 0.13 and I looked through my posts, my last post when we got 10,000 members, started tearing up because of how much squad grown over these years ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I've been following Squad ever since 2011 and I'm just happy to know that I've been with Squad this whole time. The addiction to achieve my goal to become an astronaut has grown deeply because of Squad and I'm happy to know that Squad made me make up my mind and set a life goal, I will forever act as a time capsule of memories if Squad ever vanishes for no reason since I've seen the game, the moderators like Sal\_Vager when he only had around 200 posts on the forum go from 10,000. Its been a fantastic time spent and I have to thank Squad for making me make up my mind to become an astronaut and spend my time to blow up kerbals!
Welcome back brody, yeah things really have changed around here, and your duplicate account is no more ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

you... blow up.... Kerbals? MURDER!

Egads, Sal, for the love of God, .... Release the Hounds.....

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Welcome back future Astro-nut Brody! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
